name: SimpleBumps
description:
Bump your friends off the playing field and be the last one standing!

OVERVIEW

In this multiplayer game, up to eight players can pick their tank of choice and bump each other off the stage. Each type of tank has a unique special ability that can turn the tide of battle! However, if the match takes long enough, "Overtime" will trigger, boosting everyone's speed and channeling lightning to destroy the playing field!

Featuring a three-button control scheme, quick rounds, and pick-up-and-play design, SimpleBumps is a simple game for simple situations.

TANK TYPES

Bumpers can quickly dash forward. Hit opponents to send them flying or run away from incoming attacks!

Jumpers break the floor upon landing. Carefully plan jumps to trap your opponents -- not yourself! Also makes for a neat dodge.

Shooters fire bullets that knock back opponents. Use your firepower to pick off targets from far away or get up-close-and-personal with it!

Created by Jonathan So, 2019.

"Name Smile" font by Chequered Ink.

Inspired by Motos (1985) by Namco.
